title: Moules marinière with lemongrass and chilli
description: Mussels cooked in lemongrass, ginger and chilli served with lime flavoured rice give a fragrant Thai-style twist to this seafood classic.
ingredients: 1½ limes, finely grated zest of 1½ limes, fruit of ¾ of a lime peeled, cut into segments, chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 red chilli, seeds removed, cut into thin slices
1 handful fresh coriander, leaves only, chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
